EmailTemplate.name: PC - CS app. denied
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Name}'s Application Has Been Denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Partner_Name__c}, {!Lead.Name} has unfortunately not met BlueWave's required credit criteria and is therefore unable to proceed any further in the Community Solar application process.
We have notified {!Lead.Name} of his/her application status.
Please contact BlueWave Partner Support if you have any questions about this Community Solar application.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy. - All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.817.2703 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
